title: Vinnie Goodwill on James Harden-Ben Simmons trade, Lakers' issues and more!
description:
Bomani Jones and Vincent Goodwill of Yahoo! Sports discuss the James Harden trade from the Nets to the 76ers (4:00), as well as the Lakers falling apart with LeBron James and Anthony Davis not playing like they used to (19:40). Plus, the All-Star level of Russell Westbrook and Klay Thompson’s careers are finished right (34:47)?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
